config.title: Encrypted Connection
config.description: This are the encrypted connection information about your servers. Don't edit this!

password.title: Encrypted Password
password.description: This is the encrypted password. Don't edit this!

showInDock.title: Open In Atom Dock
showInDock.description: Open the view as tab in atom dock instead of panel. Only available from Atom 1.17.0

showOnRightSide.title: Show On Right Side
showOnRightSide.description: Show the view on the right side of the editor instead of the left.

allowPendingPaneItems.title: Allow Pending Pane Items
allowPendingPaneItems.description: Allow items to be previewed without adding them to a pane permanently, such as when single clicking files in the tree view.

hideIgnoredNames.title: Hide Ignored Files
hideIgnoredNames.description: Don't show items matched by the `Ignored Names` core config setting.

showHiddenFiles.title: Show Hidden Files
showHiddenFiles.description: Force FTP Server to show hidden files (e.g. htaccess)

sortFoldersBeforeFiles.title: Sort Folders Before Files
sortFoldersBeforeFiles.description: When listing directory items, list subdirectories before listing files.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Output debug messages to the console.
